text: Moshi kare-ra ga hankō shite saru no ga anata ni hidoku kutsūnaraba, anata ni dekirunara,-chi ni ton'neru o hori, matawa ten ni hashigo o kakete, kare-ra ni shirushi o gen wase. Arrā ga o konomi ni narunaraba,(tadashī) michibiki no ue ni kare-ra o atsume rareru. Sorede anata wa, muchinamono no nakama to natte wa naranai
